platform_fees.transaction_fee_description: TexFlowMKT takes 5% of each transaction. Sellers receive 95%.

product_pricing_types.description: No charge to access the product
Price varies based on usage (API calls, data processed, etc.)

refunds.platform_policy: Refunds are handled according to individual product refund policies

taxes.handling: Prices shown do not include applicable taxes
taxes.tax_calculation: Taxes calculated at checkout based on jurisdiction

bulk_discounts.product_level: Individual products may offer bulk pricing - see product Agent Appeal

price_display.notes: Final charge includes product price only. Platform fee is deducted from seller's portion.
